short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Easily discover great content, save it on the go, and share it whenever you want! Take back your time.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Find yourself searching online, discovering great content, wanting to share it, but don’t really feel like downloading it to your device or slacking/emailing your team? 

Yeah, same. This happened to us all the time.

Enjoy UNUM for Chrome.

Easily discover great content, save it on the go, and share it whenever you want!
Take back your time and spend it with friends and family. 
From our team to yours, cheers :)

It’s easy to use and beautifully designed, like all our products:

Once added, simply….

Find content anywhere online
Click the UNUM icon to save it
Add or update the caption
Save to any of your current Spaces (or create a new one)
Done, now onto the next.

Access it anytime on your UNUM web app, iOS app, or ipad. 

And yes, it’s free. Enjoy and give us a share if you can :)

Happy designing,

The UNUM Team
